backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization mixins, storage mixins, data models, and in-memory maps for glossary, articles, research papers, market data, blogs, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the market ticker feature to frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation describing how to retry deployments, build assets, and troubleshoot common deployment issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark modes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up fonts, favicons, meta tags, and mounting the React root.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Explains available deployment helper scripts and their purpose.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Shell script automating full frontend and backend build/deploy stages with timestamped logging and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, theme, query client, maintenance-mode wrapper, global layout, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo with error handling and a text fallback when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Cash: Renders a cash‑flow table with optional running balance and supports CSV download; shows an empty state when no rows exist.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Empty file placeholder for a bar chart component.
Displays an investment breakdown donut chart with invested and earned segments, handling zero‑data states.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements an interactive chat widget with intent detection, disclaimers, backend queries, and dynamic message handling.
frontend/src/components/domain/CustomDom: Empty placeholder for a custom domain FAQ component.
Empty placeholder for a custom domain setup guide component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer containing a live or closing NIFTY 50 stock ticker with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: Provides UI for exporting, validating, and restoring glossary snapshots with merge or replace options.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBulkImpo: Offers a panel to publish a predefined batch of C-prefix glossary terms with confirmation and status handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a responsive header with navigation, theme switching, authentication handling, and calculator menus.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Shows a branded maintenance screen informing users the site is temporarily unavailable.
frontend/src/data/glossaryBulkImportC.ts: Provides a version‑controlled list of glossary terms beginning with C for bulk backend import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for calling backend methods, including maintenance checks, user profile operations, chat, and glossary queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, spacing, and UI tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy sections using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays categorized financial articles with tabs and fetches articles per category via a query hook.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Implements an APY calculator that computes contributions based on age and desired pension using an approximate matrix.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with metadata, tags, and loading/error states fetched via a blog query.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with summaries and metadata, handling loading and error states and enabling navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Interactive CAGR calculator page allowing users to input initial value, final value, and years to compute annualized growth.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Displays categorized lists of financial calculators with navigation links and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page that sends feedback via a mutation hook and shows contact options like email and Instagram.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Shows legal disclaimers and warnings about investment risks and clarifies the educational purpose of the site.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: Loan EMI calculator page that computes monthly EMI, total interest, and repayment based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: React page that calculates EPF maturity using employee/employer contributions, interest compounding, and displays results with form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: React page for FD maturity calculation supporting simple and quarterly compound interest with user inputs and displayed results.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Admin panel for viewing, filtering, and sorting feedback with authentication, authorization checks, and storage usage display.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: React page comparing fixed-rate and reducing-balance loan interest, computing totals and differences based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Renders glossary terms with search, grouping, admin diagnostics, and tools for backup/restore and bulk import.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Provides an Indian gratuity calculator using salary and years of service with eligibility checks and formatted output.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: GST calculator page computing CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount from a base amount and GST rate.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Calculates home loan EMI, interest, and total repayment based on loan amount, interest rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main landing page with hero content, navigation buttons, and feature sections for learning, glossary, and research.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Implements an HRA tax exemption calculator using salary, DA, rent, and city type inputs with computed exempt and taxable amounts.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Renders a learning page that loads sections, matches them to selected topics, and auto-scrolls to the relevant section.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Provides a lump sum investment calculator using compound interest with input fields, results, and a cash flow schedule.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates NPS corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on contribution, age, and return inputs.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes NSC maturity value and interest using compound interest based on investment, rate, and duration.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates PPF maturity, interest earned, and total investment through yearly contributions and annual compounding.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: React page providing a recurring deposit calculator with inputs for monthly investment, interest rate, and tenure, computing maturity value and interest.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Static informational page displaying SEBI and RBI guidelines, investor protection details, and fraud awareness using tabs and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Page fetching and listing research papers with download links, showing loading and empty states when needed.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: Renders a simple interest calculator page with inputs for principal, rate, and time, and computes and displays simple interest and total amount.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: Provides a comparison tool for simple vs compound interest with inputs including compounding frequency and displays both results and their difference.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: SIP calculator page that computes future value based on monthly contributions, rate, and duration, and shows cash‑flow details.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: SSY calculator computing maturity amount based on yearly deposits, girl's age, and fixed scheme interest rate.
Implements step-up SIP calculators for amount-based and percentage-based increases, computing invested amount, total value, and returns over time.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: SWP calculator simulating monthly withdrawals, returns, and remaining balance over a set duration.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: Renders an XIRR calculator allowing multiple dated cash flows and computes XIRR using a Newton–Raphson approximation.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Contains language, recommendation, tax/legal intent detection and builds refusal responses for a finance education assistant.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Generates asset URLs using Vite base path and exposes centralized static asset paths and brand constants.
frontend/src/utils/cashFlowSchedules.ts: Provides helpers to generate monthly/yearly labels and build cash flow schedules including running balances and maturity rows.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides CSV field escaping, array-to-CSV conversion, and client-side CSV download utilities.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains number, currency, percentage, and byte-size formatting helpers using Indian conventions.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions, extracts 'Also read' references, and normalizes terms for grouping and lookup.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryKey.ts: Generates deterministic normalized keys for glossary terms and converts terms to backend-safe keys.
frontend/src/utils/learningTopics.ts: Defines learning topic metadata and provides lookup utilities by slug or section title.
frontend/src/utils/navStructure.ts: Defines the grouped navigation structure used for menus across the UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and session parameter parsing, persistence, cleanup, and hash-based param extraction.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom themes, typography, colors, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state and feature requests for implementing NSE-sourced market ticker data.
